#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 1000000


int main()
{
	int tc;cin>>tc;
	while(tc--)
	{
		int n,m,t;
		cin>>t>>n>>m;
		int no;
		int a[m + 1];
		int temp[m + 1];
		for(int i = 1;i <= n;i++)
		{
			for(int j = 1;j <= m;j++)
			{
				if(i == 1)
				{
					cin>>temp[j];
				}
				else
				{
					int point;
					cin>>point;
					if(j == 1){
						temp[j]	= point + min(a[j + 1],a[j]);
					}
					else if(j == m){
						temp[j] = point + min(a[j],a[j - 1]);
					}
					else{
						temp[j] = point + min(a[j],min(a[j + 1],a[j - 1]));
					}
				}
			}
			for(int k = 1;k <= m;k++)
			{	
				a[k] = temp[k];
		//		cout<<a[k]<<" ";
			}
		}
		int ans = 10000000;
		for(int i = 1;i <= m;i++)
			ans = min(ans,temp[i]);
		if(ans < t)
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
